title: Oceans and the law of the sea
text:
United Nations 
A/80/L.29
 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: Limited 
4 December 2025 
Original: English 
 
25-19905 (E)    051225     
*2519905* 
 
 
Eightieth session 
Agenda item 75 
Oceans and the law of the sea 
 
 
 
Brazil:* amendment to draft resolution A/80/L.22 
 
 
Oceans and the law of the sea 
 
 
 
Replace operative paragraph 200 with the following text: 
 
Welcomes, in this regard, the convening of the thirtieth session of the 
Conference of the Parties to the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate 
Change, the twentieth  session of the Conference of the Parties serving as the Meeting 
of the Parties to the Kyoto Protocol and the seventh session of the Conference of the 
Parties serving as the Meeting of the Parties to the Paris Agreement in Belém, Brazil, 
from 10 to 21 November 2025; 
 
 
 
* Any changes to the list of sponsors will be reflected in the official record of the meeting.
